premise_source_doc_sentence: Thomas John Patrick `` Tom '' Welling  (  born April 26 , 1977  )  is an American actor , director , producer , and model best known for his role as Clark Kent in The WB/CW superhero drama Smallville  (  2001 -- 11  )  .
Smallville , which ended its tenth and final season on May 13 , 2011 , follows Clark Kent  (  Tom Welling  )  in the fictional town of Smallville , Kansas , before he becomes known as Superman .
The series follows the adventures of the young Clark Kent  (  Tom Welling  )  in the fictional town of Smallville , Kansas , before he becomes Superman .
